about_the_game:
This is a time-limited demo for Phoenix Point: you will have 10 days of in-game time to recruit, build, research, and fight against a deadly mutant menace that threatens the last remnants of mankind. Research and develop new technologies, explore a ravaged globe, build your bases, manage resources, and dominate the battlefield through turn-based tactical missions in this sci-fi strategy game from the creator of X-COM.

Once the demo’s time has elapsed, you can save your progress, and pick up where you left off should you decide to buy the full game.

content_descriptors.notes: Phoenix Point contains depictions of science-fiction combat, including the use of guns, energy weapons, explosives, melee weapons, and other military-style devices. Phoenix Point also contains depictions of mutated humans and alien creatures that younger audiences may find disturbing.
